hike.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a long walk in the mountains or countryside
hike.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a large increase in prices, wages, taxes etc
hike.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Several airlines have proposed fare hikes, effective October 1.
The president has proposed a hike in the minimum wage.
hike.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to take a long walk in the mountains or countryside
hike.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: His dream is to hike the Appalachian Trail.
hike.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount
hike.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a large increase in prices, taxes, or INTEREST RATEs
hike.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: The government is proposing massive hikes in taxation.
There is growing public concern over price hikes and joblessness.
hike.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: to increase prices, taxes, or INTEREST RATEs by a large amount
hike.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: The Chancellor hiked National Insurance contributions.
